remarks: Move LHS right multiplication to RHS. (Contributed by David A. Wheeler, 11-Oct-2018.)
statement:
mvlrmuld.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) $.
mvlrmuld.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. CC ) $.
mvlrmuld.3 $e |- ( ph -> B =/= 0 ) $.
mvlrmuld.4 $e |- ( ph -> ( A x. B ) = C ) $.
mvlrmuld $p |- ( ph -> A = ( C / B ) ) $.
